MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Llanddeiniolen and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7PM due to a faulty piece of equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10PM . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:36pm on 19th October 2020.
